message: Cool then.. I am an AI Engineer and I just want to go with AMA type of content as of now..

Okay, I understand you're an AI Engineer and want to create an "Ask Me Anything" (AMA) style content for LinkedIn.  To help me create the best content for you, could you please tell me:

1. **What specific area of AI engineering do you want to focus on in your AMA?** (e.g., machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, computer vision, etc.)  This will help tailor the content to a relevant audience.
2. **What kind of questions do you anticipate?**  Knowing this will help me craft a compelling introduction and structure for your AMA.
3. **Do you prefer a short LinkedIn post announcing the AMA or a longer article outlining your expertise and the AMA details?** This will determine the `content_type` I use in the `content_creation_tool`.

Once I have this information, I can use the available tools to research relevant content and generate a draft for your approval.
